document.masterDocTitle: New genus and new species of the subfamilyMetrodorinae from China (Orthoptera Tetrigidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genus and new species of the subfamilyMetrodorinae from China (Orthoptera Tetrigidae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Key Laboratory of Ecology of Rare and Endangered Species and Environmental Protection (Guangxi Normal University), Ministry of Education, Guilin, Guangxi 541006, China & Guangxi Key Laboratory of Rare and Endangered Animal Ecology, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin, Guangxi 541006, China College of Life Science, Guangxi Nomal University, Guilin, Guangxi 541004, China & 1121144759 @ qq. com; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0001 - 9893 - 9304

Key Laboratory of Ecology of Rare and Endangered Species and Environmental Protection (Guangxi Normal University), Ministry of Education, Guilin, Guangxi 541006, China & Guangxi Key Laboratory of Rare and Endangered Animal Ecology, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin, Guangxi 541006, China College of Life Science, Guangxi Nomal University, Guilin, Guangxi 541004, China

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of
Macromotettix Günther, 1939

paragraph.keyLead: - Head not or slightly exserted above pronotal surface......................................................... 3

2. Upper margin of pronotum straight in profile; ventral margins of middle femora undulate; hind wings not reaching the caudal end of pronotum. Distribution in Vietnam ( Tonkin )....................................
M. tonkinennis Günther, 1939

- Upper margin of pronotum undulate before shoulders in profile; ventral margins of middle femora straight; hind wings reaching the caudal end of pronotum. Distribution in Indonesia ( Sumatra )....................
M. quadricarinatus ( Bolivar, 1898 )
- Frontal costa before eyes visible, vertex and frontal costa forming a round or obtuse shape.......................... 10
4. Hind wings strongly reduced and just reaching the base of hind femora........................................... 5
- Hind wings elongated and extending beyond the middle of hind femora.......................................... 7

5. Tegmina degenerate and very small; ventral margins of middle femora with two teeth. Distribution in China ( Sichuan )..................................................................................
M. microptera Deng
, sp. nov.
- Tegmina normal; ventral margins of middle femora without tooth............................................... 6

6. Disc of pronotum coarse, with numerous protuberances; disc of pronotum concave between shoulders; ventral margins of fore and middle femora slightly undulate. Distribution in China ( Sichuan )......................
M. sichuanensis Deng, 2018

- Disc of pronotum smooth; disc of pronotum convex between shoulders; ventral margins of fore and middle femora straight. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).......................................
M. xinganensis Zheng, Zhang & Dang, 2009
7. Width of vertex narrower than the width of an eye; hind wings reaching the caudal end of pronotum................... 8
- Width of vertex wider than or equal to the width of an eye; hind wings not reaching the caudal end of pronotum.......... 9

8. Anterior margin of vertex straight; upper margin of pronotum straight in profile. Distribution in Solomon Islands ( Guadalcanal ).......................................................................
M. solomonennis Günther, 1972

- Anterior margin of vertex arched; upper margin of pronotum undulate before the shoulders in profile. Distribution in China ( Taiwan) .....................................................................
M. sokutsuensis ( Karny, 1915 )

9. Disc of pronotum smooth; ventral margins of middle femora straight. Distribution in Samoan Islands...............................................................................................
M. compactus ( Chopard, 1929 )

- Disc of pronotum coarse; ventral margins of middle femora undulate. Distribution in China ( Hunan and Guangxi ).............................................................................
M. luoxiaoshanensis Zheng & Fu, 2000
- Width of vertex slightly wider than or equal to or narrower than the width of an eye............................... 13

11. Lateral carinae of prozona parallel; upper margin of pronotum undulate, median carina high and lamellar before shoulders in profile and suddenly depressed behind shoulders; hind wings strongly reduced and just reaching the base of hind femora. Distribution in China ( Sichuan ).....................................................
M. undulatifemura Deng, 2018

- Lateral carinae of prozona constricted backwards; upper margin of pronotum slightly undulate, median carina low in profile; hind wings elongated and extending beyond the middle of hind femora......................................... 12

12. Width of vertex 1.5 times the width of an eye; antenna inserted between lower margins of eyes; with abbreviated carinae between shoulders. Distribution in China ( Yunnan and Guangxi )............................
M. torulosinota Zheng, 1998

- Width of vertex 2.0 times the width of an eye; antenna inserted below lower margins of eyes; without abbreviated carinae between shoulders. Distribution in China ( Shaanxi )..............................
M. qinlingensis Zheng, Wei & Li, 2009
13. Vertex and frontal costa forming a round shape in profile..................................................... 14
- Vertex and frontal costa forming an obtused angular in profile................................................. 17
14. In lateral view, frontal costa not concave between eyes; upper margins of hind femora smooth....................... 15
- In lateral view, frontal costa concave between eyes; upper margins of hind femora distinct serrated.................... 16

15. Hind wings long, reaching the middle of hind tibia. Distribution in China ( Yunnan )..........
M. longipennis Zheng, 1998

- Hind wings very short, only reaching the middle of hind femora. Distribution in China ( Yunnan ).....................................................................................................
M. brachynota Zheng, 1998

16. Ventral margins of middle femora straight; width of midfemur narrower than width of visible part of tegmina. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).......................................................
M. serrifemoralis Zheng & Jiang, 2002b

- Ventral margins of middle femora undulate; width of midfemur wider than width of visible part of tegmina. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).......................................................
M. napoensis (Zheng, 2002)
nom. nov.
- Lateral carinae of prozona constricted backwards........................................................... 23

18. Ventral margins of middle femora with long hairs; median carina of dorsal side of hind femur serrated, with large teeth. Distribution in China ( Yunnan )...................................................
M. wuliangshana Zheng & Ou, 2003

- Ventral margins of middle femora without long hair; median carina of dorsal side of hind femur serrated or smooth, without large tooth.......................................................................................... 19

19. Disc of pronotum smooth; hind wings extending beyond the caudal end of pronotum; full length of hind tibia black. Distribution in China ( Guangxi )......................................................
M. yaoshanensis Zheng & Jiang, 2000

- Disc of pronotum coarse, with numerous protuberances; hind wings not reaching the caudal end of pronotum; full length of hind tibia not black, it with brown rings....................................................................... 20
- Width of vertex equal to or narrower than the width of an eye................................................. 22

21. In lateral view, frontal costa concave between eyes; with abbreviated carinae between shoulders. Distribution in China ( Guangxi )........................................................................
M. zhengi Deng
, sp. nov.

- In lateral view, frontal costa straight and not concave between eyes; without abbreviated carinae between shoulders. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).................................................
M. nigrituberculus Zheng & Jiang, 2006

22. Width of vertex 1.1 times the width of an eye; upper margin of pronotum undulate in profile; ventral margins of middle femora straight. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).......................................
M. tianlinensis Liang & Jiang, 2004

- Width of vertex 0.7 times the width of an eye; upper margin of pronotum convex before shoulders in profile; ventral margins of middle femora slightly undulate. Distribution in China ( Guizhou and chongqing)........
M. brachyptera Deng
, sp. nov.

23. Head not slightly exserted above pronotal surface; width of middle femora narrower than the width of visible part of tegmina. Distribution in China ( Hunan )...................................................
M. nigritibis Zheng & Fu, 2005
- Head slightly exserted above pronotal surface; width of middle femora wider than the width of visible part of tegmina.... 24

24. Disc of pronotum smooth; width of vertex equal to the width of an eye. Distribution in China ( Yunnan )....................................................................................
M. wangxiangtaiensis Zheng & Ou, 2010
- Disc of pronotum coarse, with numerous protuberances; width of vertex narrower than the width of an eye............. 25

25. In profile, frontal costa without concave between lateral ocelli; upper margin of pronotum slightly convex before shoulders and straight behind shoulders in profile; ventral margins of middle femora undulate. Distribution in China ( Guangxi )................................................................................
M. longtanensis Zheng & Jiang, 2003

- In profile, frontal costa concave between lateral ocelli; upper margin of pronotum undulate in profile; ventral margins of middle femora straight...................................................................................... 26

26. Disc of pronotum with convex between shoulders; hind wings far not reaching apex of pronotum. Distribution in China ( Guangxi )............................................................
M. convexa Deng, Zheng & Zhan, 2010

- Disc of pronotum flat between shoulders; hind wings reaching apex of pronotum. Distribution in China ( Guangxi ).........................................................................
M. guangxiensis Deng, Zheng & Wei, 2007b
